p: FEO purchased from Pollena-Aroma (Poland) was used in this study. The essential oil was analysed by gas chromatography-mass spectrometry (GC-MS) at the Faculty of Chemical Technology and Engineering, West Pomeranian University of Technology in Szczecin. The main constituent of tested essential oil was tA (77.9%) followed by fenchone (12.8%), Î±-pinene (3.8%), estragole (2.3%), limonene (2.1%) [ 14].
